item.description:
Let's celebrate President's day together for lunch. We will be coming from the AMC Framingham 15 theater after watching the 11:50 am showing of PUSH. Your welcome to join us for lunch even if you didn't go to the movie beforehand. If you would like to also go the movie, please refer to the Push for president day meet-up.

Please check back the day before for the exact time of our renovation, as we won't know the time until the movie play schedule is out.

Hope you see you all there!!
item.how_to_find_us: Just inside the door, look for the rainbow hair comb.
item.name: President's Day Lunch
